page.title: 09P.C.MARSHALL-MY LOCAL BOBBY.
page.content:
All the people in the police force wear the police uniform.It is black, and the police men wear a hat with a star on it.The police ladies have to wear black shoes and black tights.The police ladies also wear a flat hat, their shoes have to be flat too.The police men have to wear a special tie which just slips on so nobody can strangle them.They carry a radio with them always.They carry handcuffs and a truncheon.Some police men carry a whistle.
The police men I know are mainly to do with the school.P.C.Platt comes to our school and shows us video's and tells us never to steal things and never to go far away from home.P.C.Marshall is our local police man and checks every thing is alright in the school.
